targets.rawSql:
select h.name as Host,t.value as Status from items i, hosts h, triggers t, functions f 
where i.hostid=h.hostid and 
t.triggerid=f.triggerid and 
f.itemid=i.itemid and
h.name = 'Google' and
t.description = 'Unavailable by ICMP ping';

select h.name as Host,t.value as Status from items i, hosts h, triggers t, functions f 
where i.hostid=h.hostid and 
t.triggerid=f.triggerid and 
f.itemid=i.itemid and
h.name = 'Google DNS' and
t.description = 'Unavailable by ICMP ping';

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(last("bytes_recv")) FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" = 'igb0') AND time >= now() - 30d GROUP BY time(15m) fill(previous)
SELECT non_negative_difference(last("bytes_recv")) FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" = 'igb0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_difference(last("bytes_recv")) FROM "net" WHERE interface = 'igb0' and time > now() - 30d group by time(24h) fill(previous)
SELECT derivative("bytes_recv", 1s) *8 FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" = 'igb0') AND $timeFilter
SELECT derivative("bytes_sent", 1s) *8 FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" = 'igb0') AND $timeFilter
SELECT derivative("bytes_recv", 1s) *8 FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" = 'igb1') AND $timeFilter
SELECT derivative("bytes_sent", 1s) *8 FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" = 'igb1') AND $timeFilter

targets.rawSql:
select h.name as Host,t.value as Status from items i, hosts h, triggers t, functions f 
where i.hostid=h.hostid and 
t.triggerid=f.triggerid and 
f.itemid=i.itemid and
h.name = 'Cloudflare DNS' and
t.description = 'Unavailable by ICMP ping';

select h.name as Host,t.value as Status from items i, hosts h, triggers t, functions f 
where i.hostid=h.hostid and 
t.triggerid=f.triggerid and 
f.itemid=i.itemid and
h.name = 'Bell Gateway' and
t.description = 'Unavailable by ICMP ping';

targets.query: select last("status") from interface where "name" = 'wg0' and host = 'ubuntu' and time > now() - 30s
select ip_address from interface where "name" = 'enp0s25' and host = 'ubuntu' and time > now() - 30s
SELECT "uptime_format" FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'pfSense.localdomain') AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("usage_idle")  * -1 + 100 FROM "autogen"."cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND "host" = 'pfSense.localdomain') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "autogen"."mem" WHERE ("host" = 'pfSense.localdomain') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT "uptime_format" FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'freenas') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'freenas' AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "autogen"."mem" WHERE ("host" = 'freenas') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT "uptime_format" FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'ubuntu') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'ubuntu' AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" = 'ubuntu') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT "uptime_format" FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'centos') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'centos' AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" = 'centos') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT "n_users" FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'pfSense.localdomain') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "n_users" FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'freenas') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "n_users" FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'ubuntu') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "n_users" FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'centos') AND $timeFilter
select (allocated / size) * 100 AS "calculated_percentage" from zfs_pool where host = 'pfSense.localdomain' and pool = 'zroot'
select battery.charge from ups where ("ups.name" = 'BackUPSES750') and time > now() - 30s
select (allocated / size) * 100 AS "calculated_percentage" from zfs_pool where host = 'freenas' and pool = 'freenas-boot'
select (allocated / size) * 100 AS "calculated_percentage" from zfs_pool where host = 'freenas' and pool = 'zfs_volume'
select (allocated / size) * 100 AS "calculated_percentage" from zfs_pool where host = 'freenas' and pool = 'pool'
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE "host" = 'ubuntu' AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE "host" = 'ubuntu' AND "path" = '/boot' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select (allocated / size) * 100 AS "calculated_percentage" from zfs_pool where host = 'ubuntu' and pool = 'remote'
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE "host" = 'centos' AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE "host" = 'centos' AND "path" = '/boot' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select ups.status from ups where ("ups.name" = 'BackUPSES750') and time > now() - 30s
select battery.runtime from ups where ("ups.name" = 'BackUPSES750') and time > now() - 30s
select ups.status from ups where ("host" = 'Desktop-Arch')

targets.rawSql:
select h.name as Host,t.value as Status from items i, hosts h, triggers t, functions f 
where i.hostid=h.hostid and 
t.triggerid=f.triggerid and 
f.itemid=i.itemid and
h.name IN([[HOSTS]]) and
t.description = 'Unavailable by ICMP ping';

targets.query: SELECT "uptime_format" FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'Desktop-Arch') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'Desktop-Arch' AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" = 'Desktop-Arch') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select battery.charge from ups WHERE ("host" = 'Desktop-Arch')
SELECT "n_users" FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'Desktop-Arch') AND $timeFilter
select battery.runtime from ups where ("host" = 'Desktop-Arch')
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE "host" = 'Desktop-Arch' AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE "host" = 'Desktop-Arch' AND "path" = '/home' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE "host" = 'Desktop-Arch' AND "path" = '/mnt/storage1' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.definition: select name from hosts where name not like 'Template%' and name not like '{#%' and name not in ('Nest Thermostat', 'Zabbix server', 'Google', 'Google DNS', 'Cloudflare DNS', 'Bell Gateway');
list.name: HOSTS
list.query: select name from hosts where name not like 'Template%' and name not like '{#%' and name not in ('Nest Thermostat', 'Zabbix server', 'Google', 'Google DNS', 'Cloudflare DNS', 'Bell Gateway');

list.definition: select name from hosts where name not like 'Template%' and name not like '{#%' and name not in ('Nest Thermostat', 'Zabbix server', 'Google', 'Google DNS', 'Cloudflare DNS', 'Bell Gateway');
list.name: LANHOSTS
list.query: select name from hosts where name not like 'Template%' and name not like '{#%' and name not in ('Nest Thermostat', 'Zabbix server', 'Google', 'Google DNS', 'Cloudflare DNS', 'Bell Gateway');
